function_name: which means that the total supply of tokens is not set. This can lead to an incorrect total supply and potentially loss of funds.

vulnerability: The transfer function does not check if the sender has enough balance to transfer the specified amount.
The approve function does not check if the sender has enough balance to approve the specified amount.
The approveAndCall function does not check if the sender has enough balance to approve the specified amount.
The uploadBalances function does not check if the total supply of tokens is sufficient to cover the uploaded balances.
